rukus.text: 37|114|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bratan nie k meat  towleu mou sa ning ha rau n .
37|115|haey yeung ban sangkroh ke teangpir  ning krom robsa ke  teangpir aoy ruochphot pi kroh m h nd reay da thngonthngor .
37|116|haey yeung ban chuoy puokke  haey puokke kaban klaycha  puok del mean chychomneah .
37|117|haey yeung ban phdal aoy ke teangpir nouv kompir da chbasa  leasa .
37|118|haey yeung changaoulobangheanh dl ke teangpir nouv meakra da troem  trauv .
37|119|haey yeung bansaoltouk rueng robsa ke teangpir( chea kar  romluk da la) dl anak chomnean kraoy .
37|120|saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean champoh mousaea  ning ha rou n .

37|122|pitabrakd nasa  ke teangpir ku sthet knongchamnaom khnhom robsa  yeung del mean chomnue .
37|123|haey pitabrakd nasa  ai l yeasa kuchea anakneasar  mneak knongchamnaom anakneasar teanglay .

37|125|tae puok anak korp sakkar champoh roubsaamnak hpa k lan  haey puok anak baohbngchaol( karkorp sakkar) anak del bangkeut  da brasaer cheangke
37|126|khn del a l laoh  kuchea mcheasa robsa puok anak  ning chea  mcheasa robsa chidaunchitea chomnean moun robsa puok anak noh
37|127|te puokke bercha ban bdeseth nung ke( ai l yeasa)tow  vinh .  dau che  neah  pitabrakd nasa puokke nung trauv ke bramoulophdom(thveu  tearounakamm)
37|128|leuklengte banda khnhom robsa a l laoh del mean chetd smaoh  trang bonnaoh .
37|129|haey yeung bansaoltouk rueng robsa ke( chea kar romluk da la)  dl anak chomnean kraoy .
37|130|saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean champoh ai l yea sai n .

37|133|haey pitabrakd nasa  lout kuchea anakneasar mneak knong  chamnaom anakneasar teanglay .
37|134|( chaur changcha) nowpel del yeung ban sangkroh ke ning krom  kruosaear robsa ke teangoasaknea
37|135|leuklengte sdrei chrea mneak( braponth robsa ke)bonnaoh  del sthet knongchamnaom anak del trauv tearounakamm .

37|138|ning peloyb .  dau che  neah  tae puok anak min kitpichearna  te ryy
